revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Belue |image = [[File:Belue.png]] |caption = This glossy and colorful Berry has a mouthwateringly delicious appearance. However, it is awfully sour. |growtime = 5h 30m 0s |harvest = 20 berries |replant = 10% |points = 1,100 |flavor = {{!}} 10 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 0 {{!}} 30 }} '''Belue''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Nomel]] with at least 130, but no more than 160 points of sour and no more than 80 points of all other flavours. The [[Nomel]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | || 0-5000s || 5000-9800s || 9800-14500s || 14500-19800s || 19800-39600s |- !Animation | [[File:AllTreeSeed.png|50px]] || [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || [[File:BelueTreeTaller.png|50px]] || [[File:BelueTreeBloom.png|50px]] || [[File:BelueTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Belue berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Nomel.png|30px]]
[[Nomel]] || style="width: 50px;" | [[File:Nomel.png|30px]]
